TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
It's a blessoup.

Waiter! Chewbarbecue, please.

Sorry sir, I work here, I don't eat here.

Waiter, there is rye in my soup.

did you lose your rye bread in your soup?

 

Waiter! there's a star system in my soup!

Yes sir, chef says its the Milky Way Soup. With Star system noodles.

waiter! Why is there a pentastar engine in the lobster tank?

125402052024

Because it's not a lobster tank. It's a lobster APC.

Waiter! Analyze this! What's this?

Yes! *looks at the thing*
... wh-what even am i supposed to look at?
Waltur. Waiter! There's a spicy ad on my soup!

Yes, that is our added spice.

Waiter. One soup burger please.

Here, the brand new soup Whomp- Whommp-wh... how do i... what's the name for this...
ehhhh... Big Mac Soup! yeah, there you go.

Waiter! There's a dose of DHMO in my soup!

Oh no! The soup is already corroding! Quick, put on this respirator before we suffocate!

Waiter, there's a Pilot G2 pen in my soup!

Yes, it is a subtle hint that you need to sign the cheque.

Waiter, does this soup contain all the essential nutrients?

Yes, it contains vinegar essence.

Waiter! Bill!

Im sorry but Bill is unavailable, but here is Bob.

Waiter! Why do we cook bacon but bake cookies?

143702142024

Sir, you are the customer, I have told you before that the kitchen is off limits to you.

Waiter, do you have a hot pot?

Yes, the cook is having a bath in it.

Waiter! Is this pancake called so because it's hard like pan?

No. It is because the critics all hate it.

Waiter, do you know if Jebs Diner is still going?

Maybe.

Waiter, there is a fire in my soup, and I didn't start the fire. It was always burning, since the world's been turning.

We have warned you about this new pepper sauce.

Waiter! Please, a water extinguisher for that man.

Here, shake this soda and put it in your mouth, the carbon dioxide will extinguish the fire.

Waiter, do your sodas come with Mentos?

Yes, it mentally does. But don't mix it with cola, or you can feel an emotional storm.

Waiter! As it is a British pub, why are there only lobsters? Where are bobsters, robsters, and nobsters?

The bobsters (Bobbys) arrested the robsters (robbers) and we don't call our customers nobsters (nobs) to their faces.

Waiter, what is on the menu?

Your coffee. Please, take it off.

Waiter! Boiled shrimpsters, please.

Sorry, the Swedish Chef took them all to make Popcorn Shrimp.

Waiter, is that a Japanese talking Swedish Chef in my soup?

I think so, let me have a look at it ok?
Waiter, the physical presence of this solid material levitating locally on my ceramic bowl filled with this generic liquid is emanating a nuisance to my visual and feeling sensors.

Wut? Dude, you need to have a sleep!

Waiter! Report your observation officer about that strange client, ordering SCP levitating things.

We do soup, try Jebs Diner for other things.

Waiter, did you cry in my soup?
